specifics.inclusivities: Vegan, vegetarian and gluten-free options available and we are dog friendly.

appetizers.name: Bruschetta
appetizers.description: Grilled bread topped with diced tomatoes, garlic, and basil.

appetizers.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
appetizers.description: Mushrooms filled with a savory cheese and herb mixture.

main_courses.name: Grilled Salmon
main_courses.description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection, served with a lemon butter sauce.

main_courses.name: Ribeye Steak
main_courses.description: Juicy ribeye steak cooked to your liking, served with garlic mashed potatoes.

desserts.name: Cheesecake
desserts.description: Creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust, topped with fresh strawberries.

desserts.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
desserts.description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.
